featured.text: Around 1800, the seventh Duchess of Bedford, Anne Maria, began the popular practice of “afternoon tea,” a ceremony taking place at about four o’clock.

definition.zh_def: 女公爵，指一位擁有公爵頭銜的女性，通常是貴族或王室成員。
definition.en_def: A female member of the nobility who holds the rank of duke, often a title of high social status.
definition.example: The duchess attended the royal gala in a stunning gown.
